_header: Ye crossbow men in trouth ye have great need
_description: The Order of Shooting with the crossbow — sixteen stanzas rhyme

BLAru359.First Lines:
Ye crosbow men in trouth ye haue gret nede To be ful ware of deling
                    with the game lest rechelesnesse cause you some tyme to
                    blede…
BLAru359.Last Lines:
…Though that youre thombe ouerthart ye vse to lay Content
                    youre thombe your kikmygge the assay
BLAru359.Attributed Title:
The order of shoting in with the crosbow (f.
                    26bad key)
BLAru359.Editions:
Y.,  X. 
             “The Order of Shoting with the crosbow,” 
             The Retrospective Review
         1 (Feb., 1853): 206-8; signed  “X.Y.”  (p. 208) in
                 “Anecdota Literaria” : 1.206-8.
Mooney,  Linne R. 
             “Practical Didactic Works in Middle English.” 
         Diss. Toronto, 1981: 410-17.
